item.title: 贝莱德、富兰克林减持波多黎各公用事业债务
item.description: 贝莱德财务管理公司和富兰克林顾问公司（Franklin Advisers）削减了对波多黎各电力公司债券的风险敞口，因为该实体的破产仍处于悬而未决的状态。【原文：BlackRock Financial Management and Franklin Advisers cut their exposure to Puerto Rico’s power utility bonds as the entity’s bankruptcy remains in limbo.】

item.title: 微软预测显示数据中心紧缩将持续到 2026 年
item.description: 微软公司数据中心紧缩的持续时间将超过该公司之前所描述的时间，这凸显了这家软件巨头在追赶云计算需求方面所面临的困境。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s data-center crunch will continue for longer than the company has previously outlined, underscoring the software giant’s struggles to keep up with cloud demand.】

item.title: Instagram 正在 "探索 "推出专门的电视应用以推动视频发展
item.description: Instagram正在探索建立一个专门的电视应用程序，作为深入推进视频业务的一部分，此举可以让Instagram视频出现在更多观众面前，同时也为YouTube提供了更多竞争机会，后者已经可以非常方便地在电视上观看视频。【原文：Instagram is exploring building a dedicated TV app as part of a deeper push into video, a move that could get Instagram videos in front of more viewers and also provide more competition for YouTube, which already makes it very easy to watch videos on a television.】

item.title: 前美联储官员认为极端天气将带来世俗 "冲击
item.description: 美联储负责气候风险的前高级官员表示，由于天气模式越来越极端，美国经济面临着一系列长期的结构性冲击。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s former top-ranking official overseeing climate risk says the US economy faces a series of long-term, structural shocks as a result of increasingly extreme weather patterns.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 与巴西监管机构合作推动制药业发展
item.description: MercadoLibre 公司正在与巴西监管机构进行谈判，以推动药店在该公司的本地市场上销售药品。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc. is in talks with Brazilian regulators as part of its push to allow pharmacies to sell medications on the company’s local marketplace.】

item.title: 贝森特称 200 亿美元的美国-阿根廷货币互换交易已敲定
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，美国已与阿根廷中央银行敲定了 200 亿美元的货币互换框架，并在周四的社交媒体上发布了这一消息。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the US has finalized a $20 billion currency swap framework with Argentina’s central bank, making the announcement in a social media post Thursday.】

item.title: 纽维恩首席信息官称，S&P 500 指数反弹至年底的概率大增
item.description: 纽文资产管理公司（Nuveen Asset Management LLC）首席投资官表示，随着企业盈利强劲，尤其是巨型科技巨头的盈利强劲，美股可能会在年底继续攀升。【原文：US stocks are likely to continue climbing into year-end as robust corporate earnings — particularly in megacap technology giants — keep driving shares higher, according to Nuveen Asset Management LLC’s chief investment officer.】

item.title: 一级交易商在美国 30 年期债券拍卖中获得的份额创历史新低
item.description: 在周四举行的 30 年期国债月度拍卖会上，美国主要债券交易商获得的拍卖份额创下历史新低，加深了二十年来的下滑趋势。【原文：A record low share of Thursday’s monthly auction of 30-year Treasury bonds was awarded to major US bond dealers, deepening a two-decade slide.】

item.title: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle）和 GIC 支持的化工企业搁置 58 亿美元贷款
item.description: 特种化学品生产商 Nouryon 公司撤回了一项价值约 58 亿美元的双币种杠杆贷款交易，这是投资者对泡沫化的高风险债务市场感到不安的最新迹象。【原文：Specialty chemicals producer Nouryon has withdrawn a dual-currency leveraged loan deal worth around $5.8 billion in the latest sign of investor unease in the frothy market for risky debt.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟电影工作室负责人确认《威廉与魔兽》电影续集
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s film chiefs Michael De Luca and Pamela Abdy, fresh off the renewal of their contracts, confirmed that the studio will make a sequel to this year’s hit A Minecraft Movie.】

item.title: 央行称法国经济正在经受政治危机考验
item.description: 法国央行表示，尽管政治不确定性加剧给商界领袖带来压力，但法国近几个月的经济增长仍保持了韧性。【原文：France’s economic growth was resilient in recent months despite heightened political uncertainty weighing on business leaders, the country’s central bank said.】

item.title: 德意志银行称，到 2030 年各国央行将持有比特币和黄金作为主要储备
item.description: 据德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）称，由于比特币和黄金越来越受机构青睐，加上美元走软，到 2030 年，各国央行可能会持有大量比特币和黄金。【原文：Central banks may hold significant amounts of Bitcoin and gold by 2030, thanks to growing institutional popularity and a weakening dollar, according to Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 特朗普预测中国将恢复购买美国大豆
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在与习近平主席会晤后预测中国将恢复购买美国大豆，但一位内阁官员表示，联邦政府对陷入困境的农民的救济要等到政府重新开放之后。【原文：US President Donald Trump predicted China would resume purchases of American soybeans after meeting President Xi Jinping, though a cabinet official said federal relief for beleaguered farmers will have to wait until the government reopens.】

item.title: 首批品牌风险投资 17.5 亿美元入股 Norinchukin 风险投资公司
item.description: 法庭文件显示，Norinchukin 银行和日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.【原文：A joint venture between Norinchukin Bank and Japanese trading house Mitsui & Co. faces $1.75 billion of exposure to bankrupt auto-parts supplier First Brands Group, court documents show.】

item.title: 印度科塔克白银基金因溢价增长而停止新投资
item.description: 科塔克共同基金（Kotak Mutual Fund）周四暂时停止了其基金中基金计划（该计划投资于印度公司的白银交易所交易基金）的新购买，理由是国内白银短缺导致价格高于全球水平。【原文：Kotak Mutual Fund on Thursday temporarily halted new purchases in its fund-of-fund plan, which invests in the Indian firm’s silver exchange-traded fund, citing a domestic shortage that has pushed prices above global levels.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现月末国债交易量超过其他交易日
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的最新研究，每月最后一天整个国债市场的交易量比之前所了解的更加不成比例。【原文：Elevated trading volume across the Treasury market on the last day of the month is even more disproportionate than previously understood, according to new research by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: Alliance Laundry 首次公开募股 8.26 亿美元后股价上涨 11
item.description: Alliance Laundry Holdings Inc. 公司及其私募股权支持者在上市后筹集了 8.263 亿美元，开盘股价比首次公开发行价高出 11%。【原文：Alliance Laundry Holdings Inc. shares opened 11% above their initial public offering price after the company and its private equity backer raised $826.3 million in its listing.】

item.title: 私人信贷投资者对基金心存芥蒂，因为降息损害了报酬率
item.description: 商业发展公司通常被视为 1.7 万亿美元私人信贷市场的代表。现在，它们的挣扎表明这个行业正在衰弱。【原文：Business development companies are generally seen as a proxy for the $1.7 trillion private credit market. Now, their struggles are indicating a weakening industry.】

item.title: 研究称通胀预期升温给美联储带来风险
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行最近发表的一篇论文指出，与过去相比，最近通胀预期的飙升给美国中央银行抑制物价压力的能力带来了更大的风险。【原文：The most recent spike in inflation expectations poses a bigger risk than past episodes to the US central bank’s ability to tame price pressures, according to a recent paper from the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston.】

item.title: 监管希望重燃，嘉能可为马铃薯类股票注入新牛股
item.description: Canaccord Genuity 的一位分析师认为，大麻行业在经历了长达数年的低迷之后，已经做好了重新审视的准备，他将五支大麻股票中的四支评为 "买入"。【原文：After a years-long slump the cannabis industry is ready for a second look, according to a Canaccord Genuity analyst who kicked off coverage by rating four out of five cannabis stocks as buys.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔呼吁谨慎对待进一步降息
item.description: 美联储理事迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）呼吁对进一步降息采取谨慎态度，强调关税有可能造成持续通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr called for a cautious approach toward further interest-rate cuts, emphasizing the possibility that tariffs will create persistent inflation.】

item.title: 加拿大石油进入第四季度，达到 7 月以来最强劲水平
item.description: 由于亚洲对重质油砂原油的需求不断增加，加拿大重质原油价格在进入第四季度时达到了自 7 月份以来的最强水平。【原文：Canadian heavy crude prices are entering the fourth quarter at their strongest level since July amid rising Asian demand for the heavy oil sands crude.】

item.title: 凤凰城大学首次公开募股（IPO）1.36 亿美元后，所有者身价暴涨 30

item.title: 墨西哥银行在九月份会议纪要中对通胀轨迹存在分歧
item.description: 墨西哥央行周四公布的最新决策纪要显示，墨西哥央行行长们在通胀是否会平稳放缓至目标水平，或新风险是否会危及这一轨迹的问题上存在分歧。【原文：Mexico’s central bankers are split on whether inflation will slow smoothly to target, or whether new risks jeopardize that trajectory, according to the minutes of their latest decision released on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国考虑对连接中国的路由器巨头 TP-Link 采取行动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府正在考虑是否采取重大举措，限制与中国有关联的路由器制造商 TP-Link Systems Inc.【原文：The Trump administration is considering whether to take a major step toward restricting the US operations of TP-Link Systems Inc., a China-linked router-maker whose Wi-Fi equipment is popular in the American market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 第一国民金融公司准备出售 6 亿加元债券
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大抵押贷款机构第一国民金融公司正准备在下周出售 6 亿加元（约合 4.28 亿美元）的债券，因为它离被私募股权投资者收购的日子越来越近了。【原文：Canadian mortgage lender First National Financial is preparing to sell C$600 million ($428 million) in bonds next week as it moves closer to being bought out by private equity investors, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 比索获准下挫，阿根廷市场松了一口气
item.description: 周四，阿根廷政府本周首次允许比索走软，从而缓解了当地市场的紧张状况，这种紧张状况曾导致收益率飙升，因为阿根廷政府积极买入比索以防止比索暴跌。【原文：Argentina’s government let the peso weaken Thursday for the first time this week, easing strains on the local market that had sent yields surging as it aggressively bought the currency to prevent it from tumbling.】
